title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Micro-Credentialing for ICT-Driven Creative Thinking Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between creative thinking and ICT integration based on PISA 2022 data analysis.
Learners can design three or more ICT-integrated language lesson scenarios applying inquiry-based teaching methods.
Learners can plan microlearning modules that enhance learner self-efficacy in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
